title: Tasty Palak ( Pasalai Keerai ) Chicken Recipe
content:
Palak chicken tastes so delicious and is very easy to make as well. The creamy palak puree gives a nice taste to the whole dish.

This is a simple chicken curry made using fresh spices and spinach puree. This chicken dish is so easy to make, you need basic ingredients. If you use small chicken pieces then it will be tastier.

 

Palak Chicken Recipe - Pasalai Keerai Chicken Curry

Prep time: 10 mins

Cook time: 30 mins

Total time: 40 mins

 

Recipe type: Main

Cuisine: Indian

Serves: 4 servings

 

Ingredients

Oil - 3 tablespoons

Ghee - 3 tablespoons

Cumin Seeds / Jeerakam - 1 tsp

Cinnamon / Pattai - 1 stick

Cardamom / Yelakai - 4

Onion - 1 large chopped very finely

Tomato - 2 large chopped very finely

Chicken - 500 grams cubed

Palak - 2 cups puree

Chilli Powder - 2 teaspoon

Coriander Powder - 1 tablespoon

Cumin powder - 1 teaspoon

Garam masala powder - 1 teaspoon

Salt to taste

Dried Fenugreek Leaves / Kasuri methi leaves - 1 tablespoon

 

Instructions

Heat oil in a pan. Add in whole spices and let them sizzle.

Add in onions and cook for 5 mins.

Add in tomatoes and cook till mushy.

Add in chicken and sear for few mins.

Add in spice powders, salt and mix well.

Add in palak puree and mix well.

Add little water and cover and cook for 15 mins.

Add fenugreek leaves and mix well.

Serve it.

recommendations.title: Tasty Chicken Lasagna Recipe
recommendations.content:
Lasagna is quite easy to make but it can feed a crowd. All you need is to make some tomato sauce and white sauce and you are good to go. You can make a huge batch of it and make multiple pans of lasagna and freeze it. You can directly bake frozen lasagna and enjoy on busy weeknights.
